definition: actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Your reality is only spirit. Therefore you are in a state of grace forever.
sentences.chinese: 你的实相是纯粹属灵的，因此你永存于恩典之境。

sentences.english: Instead of running away from the problem, we are facing reality as it is.
sentences.chinese: 我没有逃避问题，反之我是如实地正视实相。

sentences.english: She who sends energy to the matrix that perpetuates the reality in which souls may manifest.
sentences.chinese: 向矩阵传送能量的她使灵魂可以显现的实相永存。

sentences.english: We must experience directly the reality of this mental-physical phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须直接体验这身心现象的实相。

sentences.english: In reality, though, she is none other than our own buddha nature.
sentences.chinese: 然而于实相中，伊喜措嘉与我们自己的佛性并无分别。

sentences.english: Remember, to truly understand Ultimate Reality you
sentences.chinese: 记住，要真正领会终极实相，你得走出你的心智。

sentences.english: In the waking state it focuses in physical reality.
sentences.chinese: 它在清醒状态时聚焦于物质实相。

sentences.english: This is the Self that never sinned, nor made an image to replace reality.
sentences.chinese: 这个自性永不犯罪，也不会妄造形象来取代实相。

sentences.english: To put it differently, does the thought process discover the real?
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，思维过程是否能发现实相？

sentences.english: The awakened one is one with the what is.
sentences.chinese: 觉醒的人与如是的实相在一起。

sentences.english: Samadhi is the only stable unchanging Reality.
sentences.chinese: 三摩地唯一的稳定不变的实相。

sentences.english: What difference does the content of a dream make in reality?
sentences.chinese: 不同的梦在实相里又有何分别？

sentences.english: It is only then that we will find reality.
sentences.chinese: 只有这时，我们才能发现实相。

sentences.english: Conscious guardians seek to support the whole of the consensus reality or planet or star that they reside upon.
sentences.chinese: 者寻求去支持一致实相或所居住的行星或恒星的整体。

sentences.english: Is this part of becoming reconnected to the larger reality?
sentences.chinese: 这部分正连接到更大的实相？

sentences.english: All probable reality is based on the actualized thought forms and free will of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 所有可能的实相都是基于实现人类的自由意志与想法。

definition: to understand/to comprehend the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
the Four Noble Truths (Buddhism)/see also 四諦|四谛[si4 di4] and 苦集滅道|苦集灭道[ku3 ji2 mie4 dao4]

the Four Noble Truths (Budd.), namely: all life is suffering 苦, the cause of suffering is desire 集, emancipation comes only by eliminating passions 滅|灭, the way 道 to emancipation is the Eight-fold Noble Way 八正道/also called 四諦|四谛

the Four Noble Truths (Budd.), covered by the acronym 苦集滅道: all life is suffering 苦, the cause of suffering is desire 集, emancipation comes only by eliminating passions 滅|灭, the way 道 to emancipation is the Eight-fold Noble Way 八正道
